detail.name: 金色ラブリッチェ
detail.introduction: 私立诺布尔学园——走出这里的学生，都将是未来的绅士淑女。在这所全宿制的学校，他们不仅要学习文化，还要培养优良的素养。特别是在今年，由于北欧某小国的王族入学，校内更是弥漫着前所未有的紧张感。就在这时，主人公市松央路意外得到该国公主的赏识，并被迫走进了诺布尔学园的大门。与之同时，他不得不搬进了女生宿舍一角剩余的空房间....
detail.typeDesc: 金色学园恋爱冒险游戏

音乐.name: 樋口 秀樹
音乐.empDesc: BGM, True End ED composition, arrangement & lyrics

歌曲.name: 茶太
歌曲.empDesc: True End ED 'Ano Kagayaki o Wasurenai'

characters.name: キュロちゃん
characters.introduction:
暗中守护希尔维的宠物兼贴身保镖。
原本是用闪卡交换的玩具套装中包含的吉祥物玩偶,
后经索尔特雷吉的先进科学技术改装,
并搭载了人工智能其可爱外表之下隐藏着诸多尖端军事技术。

characters.name: 妃 玲奈
characters.introduction:
与央路同班的辣妹。活泼可爱,对任何人都坦率随和,是班里的大红人。
很受男生追捧,但她现在比起找男人更想和同性朋友玩个尽兴。
最近的爱好是调侃容易轻信别人的希尔维。

为将来进军时装界而进入诺布尔学园学习,
但她并非大小姐出身,和同为一般人的央路交好。

characters.name: シルヴィア・ル・クルスクラウン・ソルティレージュ・シスア
characters.chineseName: 希尔维娅·路·库洛斯克劳恩·索尔特雷吉·希斯雅
characters.introduction:
北欧王国“索尔特雷吉”的公主,爱称是“希尔维”。
尽管在王位继承顺序中排名靠后,依然是需要本国隆重接待的贵宾。
平日里总是一副天真烂漫、纯真无邪的少女模样。

喜欢边走边吃,常常买蜜瓜包大快朵颐。
而在她以前的生活中从未出现过央路这样的人,因此对其产生了不小的兴趣
有些不谙世事,以为日本依然存在“武士”“忍者”等人物,除此之外还容易轻信他人。

是享誉世界的钢琴家,还是日本女歌手“玛里亚・毕肖普”的粉丝。

characters.name: マリア・ビショップ
characters.introduction:
主人公无比痴迷的歌手。
自从于网络发布歌曲,迄今在全世界已有过亿下载量,
包揽了美国、英国、日本的无数音乐大奖。
被称为日本音乐界最后的女歌手。
没有与艺人事务所签约,
除了歌曲无法查询她的任何个人信息。

characters.name: 僧間 理亜
characters.introduction:
生性阴郁的混混少女,与央路不同班。

爱抽烟,因此数次受到停学处分。
嘴非常毒,对任何事都表现得毫无兴趣,性格乖僻。
是全校闻名的不良学生,除了玲奈等生性开朗的人以外没有人接近她

characters.name: エロイナ・ディ・カバリェロ・イスタ
characters.chineseName: 艾罗伊娜·蒂·卡巴列罗·伊斯塔
characters.introduction:
负责希尔维贴身警卫的女骑士,爱称为“艾尔”。
精通十八般武艺,无人能够企及,但对武艺之外的事基本一窍不通。
与希尔维一样性格老实、容易轻信别人,
但得知被骗后会大发雷霆,所以没有人敢捉弄她。
反感荤段子,如果有人拿她的名字开玩笑会非常生气。

在校内她的举止被打上了“孤高”的标签,很受女生欢迎,
并且在回应别人时态度亲切,因此也拥有很多隐藏粉丝。

characters.name: 栗生 茜
characters.introduction:
田径社热血少女,比主角们低一年级

行事莽撞冒进,不计后果。
一向是先行动后思考的作风,凡事都想凭气势和毅力解决。
在宿舍被视为吉祥物,时常被玲奈捉弄,或被希尔维宠爱。
遇上强硬的态度反而会招架不住,很快便会放弃抵抗。

characters.name: 城ヶ崎 絢華
characters.introduction:
央路所在班级的班长。家族内经营着某电视台,属于暴发户大小姐。
待人接物温婉优雅,但有极度的施虐倾向,话里带毒。
鄙视平民,希望央路和玲奈等平民全部离开诺布尔学园。

由于黑色长直发完全符合主人公的喜好,主人公基本拿她没辙。
讨厌别人拿她偏大的臀部说事,会因此大发雷霆。
extensionName: じょうがさき あやか

characters.name: カミナル・ル・プルテア・ソルティレージュ・シスア
characters.chineseName: 卡米娜尔·路·普鲁提亚·索尔特雷吉·希斯雅
characters.introduction:
希尔维的妹妹,索尔特雷吉第十公主。爱称是“米娜”

她独具慧眼,不看身份地位而是依为人识人。
然而邋遢懒散的主人公貌似入不了她的法眼,对主人公颇有微词。
为了姐姐一心想要矫正主人公的生活作风,花了不少心思。

characters.name: 市松 央路
characters.introduction: 主人公

detail.name: STEINS;GATE
detail.introduction:
宇宙虽有其起源，却没有终结——无限。

星球也有起源，却因其自身之力走向毁灭——有限。

历史上拥有智慧的人类往往是最愚昧的。

生活在海中的鱼不知道陆地的存在，如果它们拥有智慧也会走向毁灭。

人类如果想要超越光速，比鱼类生活在陆地更为滑稽。

这就是，对于反抗神人们的最后通牒。

其他.name: 下倉 バイオ
其他.empDesc: Scenario composition assistance, time leap concept assistance

characters.name: 牧瀬 紅莉栖
characters.introduction: Kurisu is a neuroscience researcher at an American university, and can speak and read English well. Having had her research published in the academic journal Science at the young age of 18, Makise is extremely talented. She skipped a grade in the American school system. She does not get along with her father and has not spoken to him in many years. Okabe often just calls her assistant or one of a number of nicknames he comes up with, such as "Christina", "the Zombie", and "Celeb Sev", none of which she likes. She is considered a tsundere character; she dislikes this characterization as well, strongly objecting whenever Daru mentions it.

characters.name: 椎名 まゆり
characters.introduction: Mayuri is a long-time childhood friend of Okabe and a bit of an airhead. Mayuri enjoys creating cosplay costumes and has a part-time job at a maid cafe called "Mayqueen Nyannyan". She often calls herself Mayushii, a portmanteau of her given name and surname, which is also what Daru calls her. She has a distinctive sing-song way of speaking, and she typically sings "tutturuu" when she arrives or introduces herself.

characters.name: 阿万音 鈴羽
characters.introduction:
Amane Suzuha works part-time for the landlord of Rintarou's flat and is on a search for her father in Akihabara. She enjoys riding her bicycle and appears to be at odds with Kurisu.

She is in fact a Time Traveller from 2036 who, using the guise of John *****, seeks to prevent SERN from creating a Time Machine that will lead to dystopia. Though she is unaware of it, she is the daughter of Hashida Itaru/

From Wiki

characters.name: 橋田 至
characters.introduction: Daru is an experienced hacker who has known Okabe since high school. He is very skilled at computer programming and with old and new computer hardware. He is also well-versed in things pertaining to otaku culture. Okabe and Shiina refer to him by the nickname "Daru", a portmanteau of his given name and surname. Okabe sometimes also calls him Super Haker, mispronouncing the word "hacker" to his chagrin. He is a big fan of Faris and he frequently says things which could be taken as sexual harassment. Daru is often annoyed with Okabe's frequent delusional behavior.

characters.name: 秋葉 留未穂
characters.introduction: Faris Nyannyan works at the maid cafe "Mayqueen Nyannyan", the same maid cafe that Shiina works at, and is the most popular waitress there. Her real name is Akiha Rumiho, whose family owns Akihabara, her being the one suggested it become the city of moe and anime. She tends to add "nyan" to her sentences.

characters.name: 天王寺 裕吾
characters.introduction:
He is Okabe's landlord, who owns a TV repair store beneath his apartment, living with his daughter, Nae. Okabe often gives him the nickname "Mr. Braun" for his passion to Braun tube TV.
After seeing a gel-i-fied human in the sewers he was residing in, he was recruited by SERN, which provided the money he needed to get out of the slums. After a while SERN ordered him to go to Akihabara in Japan. It was here that he met Suzuha Hashida, his neighbour, and Tsuzuri Imamiya, his future wife.
Sometime prior to the first D-Mail, Tennouji recruited Moeka Kiryuu into the Rounders and communicated with her as "FB". It was only until Rintarou and Moeka discovers his identity was FB revealed to be a man, as FB introduced themselves as a woman to all Rounders recruits/

characters.name: 桐生 萌郁
characters.introduction:
Moeka is a part-time editor whom Rintarou encounters in Akiba. She is practically glued to her phone and cannot function without it. Even when face to face, Moeka prefers to communicate by email.
She is searching for the legendary retro PC known as the IBN 5100.

Steins;Gate Official Site

Moeka was a constantly bullied social outcast; she desperately tried to make friends and find a place to belong, but failed miserably due to her social paranoia. In 2004, she fell into a deep depression due to hating everything and being hopeless, thinking that she no longer had a reason to live, Moeka decided to *******. She drank several sleeping pills, hoping that she would die, but to no avail. As the pills were not working, her final attempt was to jump off a large building. At that moment, she received a mail from the enigmatic FB recruiting her to the Rounders, a SERN unit, changing her life forever. As FB often communicated with Moeka and acted as a mother figure towards her, speaking with Moeka about her problems and comforting her, she came to see FB as the person that gave her life meaning and devoted every waking moment to sending mails to them and carrying out their given orders, developing a dependency on FB and their mails. When that relationship which meant life to Moeka required her to kill someone, she killed. By taking another’s life, her life retained meaning. While Moeka is capable of carrying out atrocities for acceptance, she strives to be loved and has the potential to be a good person if led in the right direction.
/

characters.name: 漆原 るか
characters.introduction: Ruka is a friend of Okabe. His appearance is that of a female and he acts in a feminine way due to his upbringing, wearing girl's clothing within and outside his father's temple. He is also a close friend and classmate of Mayuri's and is often asked to try on her cosplay costumes, but as he is quite shy, he generally refuses. He is unsure of his feelings towards Okabe, who calls him by his nickname, Rukako, containing the feminine suffix -ko, to denote his feminine appearance, and thinks of Ruka as his pupil.

characters.name: 岡部 倫太郎
characters.introduction:
Rintarou is an eccentric individual, a self-proclaimed mad scientist and often refers to himself under the alias of Hououin Kyouma, which is also the name he uses to introduce himself to other people. Mayuri and Daru refer to him by the nickname Okarin, a portmanteau of his surname and given name. He is the founder of what he calls the "Future Gadget Laboratory" in Akihabara where he spends most of his time. Rintarou gives off the appearance of being delusional and paranoid, frequently referring to the "organization" that is after him, talking to himself on his phone, and engaging in fits of maniacal laughter. Most of the time he takes on a fairly arrogant personality. He is usually seen wearing a lab coat. As he experiments with time travel, he learns that he is the only one who possesses the ability to determine changes between different timelines, which he dubs "Reading Steiner"/ The character is 18 years old and a first year student at Tokyo Denki University.

Modified from .

characters.name: 天王寺 綯
characters.introduction: Yuugo's daughter who lives with him in the TV repair store and gets along well with Shiina.

characters.name: 秋葉 幸孝
characters.introduction:
Father of Akiha Rumiho (a.k.a Faris NyanNyan). His family owns a large area in the downtown districts of Tokyo, hence "Akihabara".

Yukitaka died in a plane crash several years before the events of Steins;Gate. He was the only victim of the crash. However, his daughter later uses a D-Mail to save his life, by making him believe she was kidnapped and forcing him to take the bullet train instead. However, due to the D-Mail, the Rounders were able to approach him and take his IBN 5100, which he had received from Amane Suzuha.
His survival led to a world line where Faris is a RaiNetter and Akihabara is still an Electric Town instead of a moe hub/

characters.name: 鈴木功一
characters.introduction: Kouichi is a minor antagonist who first appeared in the Steins;Gate visual novel as the cheating opponent and sore loser to Faris in the Rai-Net Access Battlers Championship.

characters.name: アルパカマン
characters.introduction: An unimportant character from a videogame in Steins;Gate. An ally of justice in Linear Bounded Phenogram.

detail.name: 素晴らしき日々～不連続存在～
detail.chineseName: 美好的每一天～不连续的存在～
detail.introduction:
由6个故事所演奏的旋律――“话语与旋律”的故事

“Down the Rabbit-Hole” ―― 「天空与世界」的故事
“It’s my own Invention” ―― 「终结与开始」的故事
“Looking-glass Insects” ――  「文学少女和化学少女」的故事
“Jabberwocky” ―― 「救世主和英雄」的故事
“Which Dreamed It” ―― 「哥哥和妹妹」的故事
“JabberwockyII” ―― 「向日葵和坡道」的故事

每个故事都是旋律。
她们的旋律又会以更大的故事共鸣下去……。

「天空与世界」「终结与开始」「文学与化学」「救世主与英雄」「兄与妹」「向日葵与坡道」

话语会成为旋律。

这就是名为『素晴らしき日々』的故事。

characters.name: 高島 ざくろ
characters.introduction:
故事“Looking-glass Insects”的主人公。
外表柔弱而若有所思、厌恶争端的温柔少女。
喜欢童话及天马行空的幻想。
extensionName: エンジェルリアドバイズ

characters.name: 間宮 卓司
characters.introduction:
故事“It's my own Invention”的主人公。
经历了世界的预定调和。
喜欢妄想的懦弱少年，是一个喜欢各种漫画、gal游戏的宅男。
经常被学校内的不良少年欺负。

characters.name: 悠木 皆守
characters.introduction:
故事“Jabberwocky”的主人公。
冷酷而热血。
对水上由岐有好感，对于间宫卓司有强烈的厌恶感。

characters.name: 間宮 羽咲
characters.introduction:
故事“Which Dreamed It”的主人公。
间宫卓司的妹妹，对哥哥异常亲近。

characters.name: 橘 希実香
characters.introduction:
北校第39代科学部部长。
运动能力差，为了锻炼而参加了田径部。
与高岛柘榴是好友，携带着匕首以及其他武器。

characters.name: 音無 彩名
characters.introduction:
身处临界线的少女。
由比尽头的天空还要遥远……人类无法到达的地方而来。
看着一切，知道一切，然后毫无作为。

characters.name: 水上 由岐
characters.introduction:
故事“Down the Rabbit-Hole”的主人公。
明快的暴力少女。
使用着由祖父传授的古武术。

characters.name: 若槻 司
characters.introduction:
镜的双胞胎妹妹。守护着对由岐不能坦承爱意的姐姐。
和镜都是剑道社的成员。

characters.name: 若槻 鏡
characters.introduction:
司的双胞胎姐姐，脚踏实地，擅长做料理。
对由岐心怀憧憬，在情爱方面有时显得十分认真。
和司都是剑道社的成员。

characters.name: 清川 明日美
characters.introduction: 北校的一名班主任。

characters.name: リルル
characters.introduction:
是kero Q的游戏《终之空》及《美好的每一天》中的登场角色。
身穿强调可爱的服装的少女。
外貌酷似间宫卓司喜欢的漫画中的魔法少女，带领人们进入世界末日之日“终之空”。

存在本身就被谜团所笼罩，是原本实际存在的人，还是《终之空》中疯狂的人类妄想中的少女也不清楚。

随着”终之空“的临近，他的存在感越来越强。

characters.name: 瀬名川 唯
characters.introduction: 北校的一名教师。监管天文社团。

characters.name: 北見 聡子
characters.introduction: 明的好朋友。

characters.name: 岩田 美羽
characters.introduction: 由岐的同学兼希实香的科学社团的成员。同时也是彩名的朋友。

characters.name: 城山 翼
characters.introduction: 对间宫卓司进行霸凌的学生。明的男朋友
